title.rendered: Apply Now | St. Mary University Admission Requirements 2024

content.rendered:
St.Mary University Admission Requirements, English Language Proficiency Tests, Country-Specific Requirements, Application fees.

St. Mary University Admission is ongoing for all interested candidates who wish to apply. St. Mary University Admission Requirements are outlined below; the admission is open for all nationals:

St. Mary University Admission Requirements

English Language Aptitude test Requirements

Our language necessities are planned to ensure you the best possible education. If English is not your first language, you might need to provide your scores from an English language aptitude assessment.

If you have not attended an English language secondary school, one of the following is necessary:

    • TOEFL: with a minimum grade score of 550 (paper-based test)
    • iBT TOEFL: maximum  grade  score of 80 in general with no band score below 20
    • IELTS Academic (including those taken for UKVI): maximum grade score of 6.5 with no score less than 6.0. We will also accept the IELTS online indicator test where IELTS testing centers are closed.
    • CanTEST:  a minimum  score of 4.5 with no individual score lower than 4.0
    • CAEL: the bare minimum of 60 with no individual band below 50
    • Cambridge ESOL Exams CAE: grade of A, B, or C
    • Pearson PTE: grade  score of 58 or better
    • Successful completion of English for Academic Purposes (EAP) Level 6 at the Language Centre, in  Saint Mary’s University
    • conclusion of university elementary English at a Languages Canada accredited school known by Saint Mary’s
    • Completion of 3 years in a Canadian secondary school where the language of instruction and examination is English
